nodes.text: Governor of Eriadu was a title held by an individual who served as governor of the planet Eriadu. Wilhuff Tarkin notably served as governor of Eriadu and was confronted by Dooku to join the Confederacy of Independent Systems. However, Tarkin declined the offer. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, a member of the Tarkin family served as the governor of Eriadu.
